Text.Name: Guard_LeiBu_1
Text.Desc: Guard that can wield the power of thunder. Worshiping of it comprehensively improves all your abilities, with extra bonuses to Artifact Mastery skill level and Artifact Power. However, it decreases your Recovery Rate of Artifact Qi.

Text.Name: Guard_LeiBu_2
Text.Desc: Guard that can wield the power of lightning. Worshiping of it comprehensively improves all your abilities, with extra bonuses to Artifact Mastery skill level and Artifact Qi Recovery Rate. However, it decreases your Artifact Power.

Text.Name: Guard_LeiBu_3
Text.Desc: Guard that is capable of deploying clouds and regulating winds. Worshiping of it can slightly improve your abilities, with extra bonuses to Protection skill level. However, it decreases your Artifact Power.

Text.Name: Guard_LeiBu_4
Text.Desc: Guard that is capable of generating rains and manifesting thunders. Worshiping of it can slightly improve your abilities, with extra bonuses to Protection skill level. However, it decreases your Artifact Qi Recovery Rate.

Text.Name: Guard_LeiBu_5
Text.Desc: One of the Five Messengers of Thunder. Worshiping of it extends Lifespan and increases Max Qi, with extra bonuses to Artifact Power, Artifact Qi and Artifact Qi Recovery Rate.

Text.Name: Guard_LeiBu_6
Text.Desc: One of the Five Messengers of Thunder. Worshiping of it extends Lifespan and increases Max Qi, with extra bonuses to Artifact Power. However, it decreases your Barrier Power.

Text.Name: Guard_LeiBu_7
Text.Desc: One of the Five Messengers of Thunder. Worshiping of it extends Lifespan and increases Max Qi, with extra bonuses to Artifact Power, Spell Power but also increases Spell Cost.

Text.Name: Guard_LeiBu_8
Text.Desc: One of the Five Messengers of Thunder. Worshiping of it extends Lifespan and increases Max Qi, with extra bonuses to Artifact Mastery skill level, Spell Power skill level and Protection skill level.

Text.Name: Guard_LeiBu_9
Text.Desc: One of the Five Messengers of Thunder. Worshiping of it extends Lifespan and increases Max Qi, and makes you learn the following Miracle: Meditation of Unification.

Text.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_1
Text.Desc: Head of the Eight Legions. Worshiping of it comprehensively improves all your abilities, and makes you learn the following Miracle: Meditation of Divinity.

Text.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_2
Text.Desc: Deity in charge of all living beings in ocean among the Eight Legions. Worshiping of it can slightly improves all your abilities, and makes you learn the following Spell: Dragon's Roar, and grants extra bonuses to your Spell skill level and Spell Power, but your Spell Cost will multiply.

Text.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_3
Text.Desc: Deity representing agility and secrecy, a king of Guards among the Eight Legions. Worshiping of it slightly improves your abilities, and makes you learn the following Spell: Curse of Yaksha. It also increases your Spell Power and Spell Cost, and reduces Spell Cooldown and Spell Cast Delay.

Text.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_4
Text.Desc: Guard that represents change among the Eight Legions. Worshiping of it slightly improves your abilities, with extra bonuses of increasing Artifact Qi Recovery Rate and reducing Spell Qi Cost.

Text.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_5
Text.Desc: Guard that represents killing among the Eight Legions. Worshiping of it slightly improves your abilities, and makes you learn the following Spell: Sword of Asura, with extra bonuses to your Battle skill level, Artifact Mastery skill level, Spell skill level and Protection skill level.

Text.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_6
Text.Desc: Guard that represents solemnity among the Eight Legions. Worshiping of it slightly improves your abilities, with extra bonuses to your Artifact Flying Speed, Artifact Speed and Artifact Turn Speed.

Text.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_7
Text.Desc: Guard that represents peace and tranquility among the Eight Legions. Worshiping of it slightly improves your abilities, and makes you learn the following Spell: Tranquility, with extra bonuses to your Charisma, Lifespan and Max Qi.

Text.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_8
Text.Desc: Guard that represents all living beings on land among the Eight Legions. Worshiping of it slightly improves your abilities, and makes you acquire the following Miracle: Meditation of Unification, with extra bonuses to your Barrier skill level and Barrier Power.

Text.Name: Guard_YouMing_1
Text.Desc: Guard in charge of life and death in Netherworld. Worshiping of it improves all of your abilities, and makes you acquire the following Miracle: Yin Yang Reversal, with extra bonuses to your Guardian skill level and Max Qi.

Text.Name: Guard_YouMing_2
Text.Desc: Soul snatcher of the Netherworld. Worshiping of it slightly improves all your abilities, and makes you learn the following Spell: Guard of Impermanence, with extra bonuses to your Artifact Mastery skill level, Artifact Power, Artifact Qi and Artifact Qi Recovery Rate.

Text.Name: Guard_YouMing_3
Text.Desc: Soul snatcher of the Netherworld. Worshiping of it slightly improves all your abilities, with extra bonuses to your Spell skill level, Spell Power but also increases Spell Cost.

Text.Name: Guard_YouMing_4
Text.Desc: Patroller of the Netherworld. Worshiping of it slightly improves all your abilities, with extra bonuses to your Barrier Power and Artifact Power.

Text.Name: Guard_YouMing_5
Text.Desc: Patroller of the Netherworld. Worshiping of it slightly improves all your abilities, with extra bonuses to your Barrier Power and Spell Power.

Text.Name: Guard_YouMing_6
Text.Desc: Driver of the ferryboat on the Nether River. Worshiping of it extends Lifespan and increases Max Qi, and makes you learn the following Miracle: Resurrection Spell, with extra bonuses to your Artifact Power and Spell Power.

Text.Name: Guard_YouMing_7
Text.Desc: Guardian of the Darkmountain in Netherworld. Worshiping of it extends Lifespan and increases Max Qi, with the extra bonuses of increasing your Barrier Power and making you acquire the following Miracle: Meditation of Unification.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_1
Text.Desc: Spirit of a star that is incredibly ferocious. Worshiping of it improves all of your abilities, with extra bonuses to Artifact Power and Spell Power. However, it will significantly reduce your Lifespan.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_2
Text.Desc: Spirit of a star that is incredibly ferocious. Worshiping of it improves all of your abilities, with extra bonuses to Artifact Power and Spell Power. However, it will significantly reduce your Max Qi.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_3
Text.Desc: Spirit of a star that is incredibly ferocious. Worshiping of it improves all of your abilities, with extra bonuses to Artifact Power and Spell Power. However, it will significantly reduce your Barrier Power.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_4
Text.Desc: One of the ancient Guards of five directions and five elements. Worshiping of it can slightly improve all of your abilities, with extra bonuses to Spell skill level and Spell Power.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_5
Text.Desc: One of the ancient Guards of five directions and five elements. Worshiping of it can slightly improve all of your abilities, with extra bonuses to Artifact skill level, Artifact Power, Artifact Qi Cap and Artifact Qi Recovery Rate.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_6
Text.Desc: One of the ancient Guards of five directions and five elements. Worshiping of it can slightly improve all of your abilities, with extra bonuses to Protection skill level and Barrier Power.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_7
Text.Desc: One of the ancient Guards of five directions and five elements. Worshiping of it can slightly improve all of your abilities, with extra bonus to Qi Sense.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_8
Text.Desc: One of the ancient Guards of five directions and five elements. Worshiping of it can slightly improve all of your abilities, with extra bonus to Max Qi.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_9
Text.Desc: Guard with unknown divine heritage. Worshiping of it can slightly improve all of your abilities, with extra bonus to Spell Power.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_10
Text.Desc: Spirit of the Guard of mountains. Worshiping of it can slightly improve all of your abilities, with extra bonus to Barrier Power.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_11
Text.Desc: Spirit of the Guard of flowers. Worshiping of it slightly improves all your abilities, and makes you learn the following Spell: Curse of Luxuriance, with extra bonus to your Max Qi.

Text.Name: Guard_Other_12
Text.Desc: Guard with enormous physical strength. Worshiping of it can slightly improve all of your abilities, with extra bonuses to Artifact's Knockback and Artifact's Knockback Resistance.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_1
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Artifact skill level, Artifact Power, Artifact Qi Cap and Artifact Qi Recovery Rate.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_2
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Max Qi.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_3
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Qi Sense.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_4
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Spell skill level and Spell Power.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_5
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Protection skill level and Barrier Power.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_6
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Lifespan.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_7
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Max Qi.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_8
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Artifact Power.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_9
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Artifact Qi Recovery Rate.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_10
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Artifact Qi.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_11
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Barrier Power.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_12
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Spell damage.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_13
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can reduce your Spell Cast Delay.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_14
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Spell Artifact Flying Speed.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_15
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Artifact Turn Speed.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_16
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Artifact's Knockback Distance.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_17
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Artifact's Knockback Resistance.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_18
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can reduce your Spell Cooldown.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_19
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can reduce your Spell Cast Delay.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_20
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Artifact Mastery skill level.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_21
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Spell skill level.

Text.Name: Guard_Base_22
Text.Desc: Unclaimed Guard that can be seen everywhere in the world. Worshiping this Guard can increase your Protection skill level.
